#summary Connecting a microSD Memory Card Socket to UDB4 or UDB5.

= Introduction =

[http://www.sparkfun.com SparkFun] sells a breakout board with a microSD socket which is called the [https://www.sparkfun.com/products/544 !Breakout Board for microSD Transflash]

== Connecting it Up ==

|| UDB || uSD ||
||     || CD ||
|| DI1 || DO ||
|| GND || GND ||
|| CK1 || SCK ||
|| 3.3 || VCC ||
|| DO1 || DI ||
|| SS1 || CS ||


You will also need a microSD card in the socket before your MatrixPilot board can read or write filesytem data.
